text: Press J to wield your sword.
K is for Wood Skill and L is for Water Skill.
Press K to cast Wood Skill.
Press L to cast Water Skill.
Press K and then press L. Notice that your vine grows taller and stays longer!

Your Elemental Skills appear on the lower right.
Friendly reminder: the arrows are extremely important.
Try attacking the Dummy with what you've just learned!
